oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-09-15 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 15, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performer George Jones (although Johnny Cash was advertised as the guest for this week on the previous show), and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Dale Potter, Don Slayman, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. On this show, Cowboy Copas presents George Jones with the Cashbox magazine award for the Most Popular and Most Promising Male Vocalist of 1956. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; George Jones; Grandpa Jones; Cowboy Copas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas presents George Jones with Cashbox award -- Gonna Come Get You (George Jones) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Grandpa Jones -- Fly Around My Pretty Little Miss (Grandpa Jones) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- Filipino Baby (Cowboy Copas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Wood, Del; Potter, Dale; Slayman, Don (Musician); Old Hickory Singers; Copas, Cowboy; Jones, George, 1931-2013
